name: Shop Droppers
description:
Some kind of racing game thrown together for a game jam.

CONTROLS
Steer: A/D or left/right arrows
Brake: S, down arrow, or space

CREDITS
Art: https://itch.io/profile/freekark
Music: https://itch.io/profile/nyxmusic
Code: https://organicpencil.itch.io/

Sound effects were pulled from the following files:
